item.description: advice to dev teams that are also true in life:
item.content:encoded:
> advice to dev teams that are also true in life:

Don't be afraid to make mistakes,
and understand when people make them, too.
The caveat is to never make the same mistakes twice.

item.description: advice to dev teams that are also true in life:
item.content:encoded:
> advice to dev teams that are also true in life:

Don't chase perfection.
Rather, settle for good enough.
Be comfortable by finding contentment,
then improve in increments.
Eventually, it'll come close to perfection.

item.description: There is still one question lingering in my head I dare not answered.
item.content:encoded:
There is still one question lingering in my head I dare not answered.
Why do I adore you? Oh, what the hell.

item.description: When you finally see the girl of your dreams,
item.content:encoded:
When you finally see the girl of your dreams,
Walking out of your life,
You could've wished you had the balls to say something crazy.
Ate up your pride.

item.description: Out of Place
item.content:encoded:
Out of Place​

When I finally meet you, what should I say?
Should I tell you how lovely you are?
For which you might have already heard countless of times,
From men you thought to be all the same.
So... no. I want to tell you something different
Sweetest words and yet without losing truth.
I hope I could make you smile
With lively stories even it's embarassing.
And this would be the start of a beautiful love story.

item.description: I can be your bestfriend, or your lover.
item.content:encoded:
I can be your bestfriend, or your lover.
I can be your true love, or your one-night-stand.
I can be your husband, or your paramour.
I can be your prince, or your slave.
I can be your hero.
I can be your fool.
I can be your knight in shining armour.
I can be your everything.
I can be anything you want me to be.
Just tell me what you want.

item.description: Caffeine
item.content:encoded:
Caffeine​

It's already morning, but I am still wide awake.
What heavy thoughts of you make.
I am weary, but the thoughts of you won't stop.

item.description: Here I am, once again played by fate.
item.content:encoded:
Here I am, once again played by fate.
I can't shake this feeling,
Being mesmerized by you.
But you're too good to be true,
It's killing me.

item.description: I am obvious and surely you must know,
item.content:encoded:
I am obvious and surely you must know,
I admire you.
And when I find the courage,
I shall speak to you all the sweetest things.
Maybe I'll sweep you off your feet,
or you can destroy all of me in just a single word.
Whatever it will be, I won't mind.
Only when I find that courage.

item.description: Banging my head into the wall,
item.content:encoded:
Banging my head into the wall,
Troubled by things out of my control.

item.description: If you are not to be my wife, I would rather not marry...
item.content:encoded: If you are not to be my wife, I would rather not marry...

item.description: Rollercoaster
item.content:encoded:
Rollercoaster​

To the slightest, softest whisper of your name,
my heart skips a beat and then goes twice, thrice much faster.
It's a rollercoaster.

item.description: Hopeless at love, for love for me is only you.
item.content:encoded: Hopeless at love, for love for me is only you.

item.description: Love me... not in this world.
item.content:encoded:
Love me... not in this world.
Love me... not at this moment.
Love me... next time.
But please... do love me.

item.description: Past my thirties, I admit I feel like I'm still not ready.
item.content:encoded:
Past my thirties, I admit I feel like I'm still not ready.
I am far from perfection, by my own standards.
I don't want to be that good guy today, and fool around ten years after.
And I've seen enough good guys turn to monsters. Most of them are friends.
Or maybe I'm just overly ambitious, always in pursuit of greatness.
Or I became too tough that I can live alone.
And maybe I'll never be perfect nor ready.
I will only have to settle on admiring you afar.

item.description: Even If
item.content:encoded:
Even If​

My love is of the greatest kind.
I love you without you knowing.
I'll love you even if you don't.

item.description: The darkest days of my life have arrived,
item.content:encoded:
The darkest days of my life have arrived,
that I'm not entirely sure whether I'll survive.
And there's not even a single soul I can talk to about.
You won't even see it in my eyes.

item.description: Codes of Perfection I live by:
item.content:encoded:
Codes of Perfection I live by:
Dress like James Bond. Fight like Statham.
Think like Steve Jobs. Style like Johnny Depp.
Act like a gentleman.
Write like Hank Moody. Live like Larry Crowne.
Play like Michael Jordan. Drive like Vin Diesel.
Train like The Rock. Chase the Dream,
and Beat that Zucker.

item.description: So it was just a dream. Still felt like so god damn real.
item.content:encoded:
So it was just a dream. Still felt like so god damn real.
But you're too good to be true, it's surreal.
That's how I knew it's just a fucking dream, but still.
For you, I'll always be dreamin'.
Because I am a dreamer, and you are mine.
Come again, and don't ever wake me up.

item.description: I am difficult to love, but love me still.
item.content:encoded: I am difficult to love, but love me still. 'Cause I love you more than anything and everything in between. You're my every morning's falling star. So here I am, on my favorite spot... waiting. To the fear of missing you out.
